    • About Dave Silva


    I am very fortunate to have lived a life that has given me so much experience and opportunity. Starting out my work life after schooling in construction and working my way through residential construction and then into commercial ‘High Rise” construction.

    The Dave Silva Realty Team was built on the premise of providing clients with unrivaled attention to transaction detail. The Team is always willing to find a solution to any problem that may come up during escrow, and they have not had a escrow not complete.
